note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is [age-standardized](#dod:age_standardized). Non-melanoma skin cancer deaths are excluded due to potentially incomplete records and inconsistent registry practices.
title: Share of cervical and all cancer deaths due to unsafe sex
subtitle: The estimated share of age-standardized deaths from cervical and all [cancers](#dod:cancer) attributed to unsafe sex as a [risk factor](#dod:risk-factor).
